author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Title says is it all. The version of this script distributed within CMSSW cannot point to the ADG Database, which is not accessible without a proper decoding key (which the lambda user doesn't have).

#### PR validation:

Relies on existing testing scripts.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Not a backport.
title: [Payload Inspector] Modify getPayloadData script in order to work also with user inputed sqlite files
